website_summaries.verdict: One of the smaller G-Shock watches, featuring atomic timekeeping.
pros: Ideal watch for those who need something durable and lightweight
The solar-powered battery can last six months without light
This analog-digital model features a discreet digital screen, and the analog hands can be easily shifted if they cover the display
cons: The small dials and digital screen can be difficult to read, especially in the dark

customer_reviews.title: To Small
customer_reviews.text: This watch is very small and the display is hard to read. You can see the time just fine but the other functions are hard to read. It's a fairly inexpensive watch but I wish Casio would stop it with the propriety bands on their watches. They have ruined most of their watches with their uncomfortable bands. It has a few nice features like atomic time and solar charging but I promptly returned this one.
customer_reviews.author: Rick B

customer_reviews.title: Great watch for those who are hard on watches and done with the whole buying batteries thing.
customer_reviews.text: This watch has stood up to the rigors of a professional kitchen. I've destroyed countless watches because of water, heat and hitting them on hard surfaces. So far, the Casio has been great. I like that I don't have to buy batteries for it and that it resets itself by the Atomic Clock. Less time I had to deal with my watch, the better. I know it's going to correct itself for DST and date changes. It also looks good to wear out for casual dates with my wife.
customer_reviews.author: Chef T

customer_reviews.title: Great watch, meant for younger eyes
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I gifted this watch to our 18 year-old son, who has narrower wrists that are a better fit for the mid-sized face of this G-shock model. He is bound for the miltary, for which this watch is ideally suited: 5 alarms, world time zones, atomic clock sensing, solar-powered, and G-shock tough. It is beautiful, but the smaller digital readouts are truly meant for younger, sharper eyes. It was also an unbeatable value at the price on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Brendan Berry

customer_reviews.title: Nice watch!
customer_reviews.text: It's a great G-shock to have in the collection. I love the size because I have a small wrist. All the features are 100. The color is a very dark blue which I like. It's not hard to read the negative dials because I read some reviews of people crying about it. I live in an area with no signal reception for the atomic time sync, but there's a 3 dollar app that sends the same signal and takes like 3 minutes to sync the time. Great watch and I am in love with it.
customer_reviews.author: SusanP

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch!!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE Casio G-Shocks. In fact, I have a small collection of them. Some, however excellent, can be very large. This particular watch is more elegant, simple, and slender. Yet, it has all the Casio "toughness", water resist to 200 meters, and is Atomic/Solar.....I have several of this model in different colors and designs.... GREAT WATCH!!!!
customer_reviews.author: ScorpioDF53

customer_reviews.title: Great watch with one caveat
customer_reviews.text: I love Casio watches - high quality and great functionality - it's great to not to have to change a battery or set the time - and also it's easy to change time zones - very cool This is a particularly handsome piece BUT beware the small LCD displays are dark and difficult to read in all but direct light. I sent this back and bought the same one with the lighter coloring which doesn't look (IMO) quite as good but I can read the LCD's so I'm lovin' it
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Hirsh

customer_reviews.title: Fun high tech watch
customer_reviews.text: I got this watch as a gift for my husband. He loves it. I ordered this watch once and got a defective one, but Amazon sent out a working replacement ASAP. I got it within 2-3 days of the original. I think this is a great feature packed watch for those that don't want a smart watch. Overall, I'm happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: penny8va

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic and attractive watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch! I took it out of the packaging, and the moment I took it towards a window with sunlight coming in, the time calibrated to the local time of where I was. I've used it swimming in the sea about a dozen times now, and it works just fine. It's nice being able to tell the time when I'm out in the water, and I love the fact that I will never have to replace the battery on this phone since it runs on solar energy! The watch also looks better in person than the pictures online - very nice!
customer_reviews.author: Gloabtrotter

customer_reviews.title: Very small face and poor illumination. Ended up immediately returning it
customer_reviews.text: Luminescence on numbers and hands barely last an hour in darkness. Almost impossible to read LCD windows. Very small face and poor illumination. Ended up immediately returning it. Bought a Casio Men's GW-9400-1CR Master of 1G Stainless Steel Solar Watch and absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: JC

customer_reviews.title: Amazing watch, I have both the black and blue ...
customer_reviews.text: This is long over due as I have been really busy. But I had purchased this watch from one of the sellers. Amazing watch, I have both the black and blue models, this one by far is the best. Works amazing! Best sized watch for smaller wrists and features are awesome for military work.
customer_reviews.author: Bukatetsu

customer_reviews.title: Inverse Dials are Unreadable in Any Light
customer_reviews.text: The dials are unreadable in the brightest of sunlight. In shock how difficult the inverse dispaly was to read, I returned to Amazon - they are great! I had these two models which I purchased from Amazon: Recommend looking at the Casio Men's AWGM100-1ACR G Shock Watch or Casio Men's AWG100-1A G-Shock Multi-Band Solar Atomic Analog Watch if you want to see and use any of the digital functions of the watch.
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: The good: As a watch it keeps time and is ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointing. I read the negative reviews prior to purchasing this watch, but didn't take their advice...big mistake! The good: As a watch it keeps time and is comfortable to wear. The bad: The hands are hard to see at night, the day/date windows are just about impossible to read day or night. It would be a 5 star value at half the price...for being just a watch with a solar charging.
customer_reviews.author: Paul A. Correia

customer_reviews.title: Great Watch. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.text: Awesome watch! Only downside is that it's hard to read the digital part unless lighting conditions are excellent. Decent lighting is not sufficient to read the digital information in my experience. However, overall, this watch is amazing. Also, very grateful for Amazon shipping the package in two days (even though I selected free shipping and the arrival estimate was over a week).
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: nice watch but hard to read.
customer_reviews.text: i really like the watch and the hands are very visible, but the sub dials are just too hard to read with the negative display.
customer_reviews.author: cactus

customer_reviews.title: Would Be 5 Stars if Color Was Accurate
customer_reviews.text: My husband collects watches and G-Shocks are some of his favorites. Very durable, especially for the work he does. I was disappointed in the color of the blue. It is much darker than pictured, which was a major bummer. But, based on past experiences with G-Shocks, I'm sure it will be a rugged, durable watch.
customer_reviews.author: D.Vance

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than typical gshock
customer_reviews.text: Looks really nice and feels good, but it's alot smaller than what I'm used to with gshocks.
customer_reviews.author: Thee Kyle Miller

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding.
customer_reviews.text: Great watch. Comfortable, good looking and acurate. Battery stays charged for me. And durable of course. Can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Schmitt

customer_reviews.title: Good watch :)
customer_reviews.text: It's a good watch, the digital is a little hard to read at times though. My mom & I had 'fun' adjusting the settings.... So, this watch wouldn't be good for those that can't read an analog time clock. Luckily I'm able to read both :), I shouldn't need a new watch for the rest of my life ;)
customer_reviews.author: Joshua J. Dotson

customer_reviews.title: Great watch
customer_reviews.text: This is is another great watch by Casio. The case isn't over sized like some G-Shocks, It's a perfect fit for me. I really like the solar and atomic multiband 6 feature. It's a great looking watch with G-Shock toughness for under $100. What's not to like.
customer_reviews.author: michael bullock

customer_reviews.title: So far it's held up nicely. I personally don't know all the features
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my boyfriend. He absolutely loves it. He's a fireman in a busy city so he needed a watch that can withstand any situation. So far it's held up nicely. I personally don't know all the features, however, he seems to be very into it.
customer_reviews.author: Mel v

customer_reviews.title: Very accurate
customer_reviews.text: This Casio G-Shock is very accurate time keeper. The watch changes time with the various time zones and day-light savings. This watch is also very good looking. It is very hard to read the date and day in low light conditions.
customer_reviews.author: JPR

customer_reviews.title: Great durable watch
customer_reviews.text: Really like this g shock. Seems very durable so far and seems to hold a good charge if given about a half hour of decently bright sunlight each day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Made for small kids and woman’s wrists.
customer_reviews.text: Extremely small watch. Can not see the complications due to the fact they are small and dark. Not what I thought a g-shock would be.
customer_reviews.author: Jim B

customer_reviews.title: highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: excellent only flaws are 1) the beeper is inaudible unless right next to ear; 2) the dark background is hard to read the dials except in bright sunlight- the light gray background model is better in this regard
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: good user directions, i wish dial face was a little bigger
customer_reviews.author: Richard A. Jeter

customer_reviews.title: Great Everyday Watch
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy but at the same time classy and discrete watch. Very similar operational system to its previous model AWG 100 series. Great for every day use. The only negative side is the dark digital display. If the light is reduced, it is almost impossible to see the digital information and the led light only helps with the analogic part. But it does not bother me.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente Amazon

customer_reviews.title: Great better than I thought looks and feels great time ...
customer_reviews.text: Great better than I thought looks and feels great time and date were set still reading and playing with the other functions easy 5tar!!
customer_reviews.author: mary

customer_reviews.title: Great time piece
customer_reviews.text: The one thing I don't like is the negative display. Make it hard to read the digital time.
customer_reviews.author: Ainsworth Morgan

customer_reviews.title: but like it so far
customer_reviews.text: Have had this watch for only a week, but like it so far. Looks great. Suitable for casual to casual dress. For formal, I'd wear one of my other watches. Very easy to set up once you understand, read the manual. comfortable. Lots of adjustments to fit your wrist. Seems a very nice watch for the under $100 range.
customer_reviews.author: LG Texas

customer_reviews.title: very happy
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch very happy, only dislike is digital display is hard to read and alarm is worthless
customer_reviews.author: watch nut

customer_reviews.title: Best watch ever!
customer_reviews.text: Always accurate and never needs batteries. Very stylish and easy to read. I love this watch!!!
customer_reviews.author: Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than anticipated
customer_reviews.text: This is much smaller than I had anticipated. Maybe I've just gotten too used to the oversized Master of G watches, but this one borders on being too small. The upside of that small diameter is that the strap doesn't stick out from the sides of my wrist, which can be an issue with larger G-Shocks. The small watch face also means the LCD displays are small. The layout is the same as the G Steel collection, but the larger dials on those watches provide more room for legible LCD displays. The watch functions fine, but if you have large wrists, you might want to look into a G Steel rather than this version.
customer_reviews.author: R. B. Bergman

customer_reviews.title: This is such an amazing watch, the blue colour is just beautiful
customer_reviews.text: This is such an amazing watch, the blue colour is just beautiful. Although I prefer a bigger dial size but the current size is acceptable. Hopefully it will last me 10 years. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Ding

customer_reviews.title: I realy like this watch
customer_reviews.text: I realy like this watch. The blue is more subtle than in the picture. The date is hard to see you though.
customer_reviews.author: Wade Cross

customer_reviews.title: If it is waterproof it will be good for swimming-we shall see
customer_reviews.text: For the price it is okay but the letters in the small windows are very hard to read.If it is waterproof it will be good for swimming-we shall see.Band was easy to size but a little thin-hope it holds up.
customer_reviews.author: Marv Bauer

customer_reviews.title: Solar atomic time analog G Shock with digital perks
customer_reviews.text: Very nice digital analog G Shock for smaller wrists. Came in the mail on medium charge and synced with the atomic time signal from the night before. Only had to change time zone to get correct time. Left hand digital dial can show month and date or digital hours and minutes. Lower shows seconds and one on right shows day of the week. Light color hands make it easy to see analog time at a glance. Lists for $150 but usually available around $100. Pretty much maintenance free with daily exposure to sunlight for a good charge.
customer_reviews.author: Capitalist

customer_reviews.title: Impossible to read in dim light
customer_reviews.text: Like many others have stated, this is one gorgeous watch, but the small negative digital displays are impossible to read, unless held at the correct angle in bright light. Night light is useless. Returned it in one day.
customer_reviews.author: RandyF

customer_reviews.title: G watch auto light not
customer_reviews.text: Auto light would not work! Was very disappointed in watch reason I purchased was for automatic light which never worked!!
customer_reviews.author: CCN 🙏

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous purchase, great help getting it set and has never disappointed !
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great watch.  Accurate and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Liked that it's small and not too chunky on my wrist. Nice watch to add to my collection, although this is my everyday timepiece
customer_reviews.author: dundee991

customer_reviews.title: Stylish everyday watch
customer_reviews.text: Husband has many fancy watches . This is most comfortable and great for everyday
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reasonably Sized, Packed With Features , Great Value  . . .
customer_reviews.text: Unlike most of Casio's G Shock offerings, the AWGM100A-1A is very modestly sized and fits my smallish wrist perfectly. At 200M water resistance it is perfectly suitable for swimming/diving and the radio controlled solar movement guarantees accuracy. Syncs every night like clockwork. Some folks complain about the digital subdials, but they are perfectly readable in office lighting and outdoors. A little tough (OK, very tough) in low light situations but that's a small trade off. The white analog hands are very easy to read in any environment. It's a classier look than the regular AWG100 and the blue bezel really pops. A great value. Don't let the dark subdials steer you away.
customer_reviews.author: VMM

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for my arm and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: I have small wrists and hate the large mass of other G-Shock watches. This one is proportioned perfectly for me and it looks great! The illumination delay is adjustable from 1 to 3 seconds which is nice. I like having a digital second counter instead of a second hand on one of the smaller displays. The small displays are somewhat hard to read but not enough to make me unhappy. As others have said the light doesn't illuminate the small displays, just the main face and hands. Solar, high medium low battery meter, stop watch, counter, world time, date, day, alarm, atomic, great size and look, very comfortable!
customer_reviews.author: Mr. E Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift after picking it out on Amazon and I must say it is much smaller than expected for a man. It is the size that a woman would wear. The diameter in the description indicates that it should be the size of my other Tough Solar watch however it is much smaller. I think that this is an error.
customer_reviews.author: RA

customer_reviews.title: This watch is AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: I have another G Shock watch that I have owned for 10+ years. G Shocks are known to be built like tanks. That's why I decided to go with another G Shock. What caught my eye was the chrome/blue accents. But when I found out all the extras it offered like it solar powered, atomic synchronization, light weight, and other features it offers I was sold! This will be the last watch I own. It is stylish but rugged too. This is a must have time piece.
customer_reviews.author: david alonzo

customer_reviews.title: I love this watch
customer_reviews.text: I love this watch. This is the perfect weight and simple design to make it a classic favorite. The fact that is solar powered and you don't have to deal with the hassle replacing batteries is awesome. I put it under a lamp for a couple hours when I first received to charge it and than set the time. It was bit tricky at first (or maybe it was just me) but after the first couple tries I finally got it set to my time zone. There is no manual button for setting the time, as you navigate the menu and press the correct sequence the time automatically advances to your time zone. I highly recommend this watch!
customer_reviews.author: D. Aschliman

customer_reviews.title: AWG-M100-1ACR REVIEW
customer_reviews.text: Nice watch. Easy to read the analog time , but a little hard to read the digital time due to the negative display being so small. Otherwise I really like the white hands against the black face and the metallic blue on the bezel.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: I like this watch more than I expected
customer_reviews.text: I like this watch more than I expected. The blue color is much darker than it appears in the picture, almost a midnight blue. Include the solar, atomic, & back light & it is a pretty good value for an inexpensive watch. Would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DVI

customer_reviews.title: Digital Too Dark
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful watch but inverted black led display is impossible to read unless you are in direct sunlight.
customer_reviews.author: Judd

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing this watch for about a month and it is OK. I really do like the looks but the date,seconds and day are in the small circles and are very small and hard to read. I recently went on a trip that had me go through several time zones and it did not change times as I went through airports. I travel a lot and that was selling point, for the watch to adjust to the time zone. I have to study the instructions further to see what the problem is.
customer_reviews.author: Gus T Elenniss

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking watch though.
customer_reviews.text: my watch does not light up at night. I can not see the dial at all without pushing the light button. the second hand is impossible see.
customer_reviews.author: Guillermo corona

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the color doesn't look like blue, it seems more shallow, but the watch is very nice, i like it.
customer_reviews.author: gokuz

The watch also features a unique hand adjustment capability in which the user can shift the hands out of the way of the digital window for easier viewing. This can be very helpful when the watches stopwatch or countdown timer functions are being used. Black resin analog and digital watch with a black face. CasioWith the launch of its first watch in November 1974, Casio entered the wristwatch market at a time when the watch industry had just discovered digital technology. As a company with cutting-edge electronic technology developed for pocket calculators, Casio entered this field confident that it could develop timepieces that would lead the market.

Today, Casio is focusing its efforts on solar-powered radio-controlled watches: the built-in solar battery eliminates the nuisance of replacing batteries, atomic timekeeping means the users never have to reset the time. Recently, Casio launched a series of Bluetooth watches that sync to the users cell phone to automatically update the time. Casio is always moving time forward.
